description: Accelerated backend development by 5x by rapidly delivering RESTful endpoints using Java Spring Boot within tight deadlines after project cancellation in an Agile/SCRUM environment.

Eliminated technical debt and improved code quality by 60% by implementing TDD practices, writing 200+ unit tests, and resolving 150+ SonarQube code smells across the codebase, maintaining zero technical debt throughout development cycle.

Developed complex functional requirements by studying project documentation and maintaining clear communication with functional teams and clients, achieving desired behavior and meeting 100% of deadlines.

Reduced order fulfillment cycle time by 70% by architecting and deploying a custom end-to-end CRM and product configurator application using Java Spring Boot backend and React frontend, automating quote generation, order processing, and manufacturing workflows for 500+ monthly transactions.
Cut infrastructure costs by 40% and improved system scalability by migrating web applications and domain servers to AWS cloud infrastructure.

Increased lead generation by 150% by redesigning company website UI/UX and implementing SEO best practices using modern JavaScript frameworks (React + Vite, Astro, Next.js), improving page load speed by 60% and search engine rankings for 20+ key terms.
